awd_titl_txt: Undergraduate Design Projects to Aid the Disabled
awd_abstract_narration: This grant will fund undergraduate                                              design projects in the area of                                                  Research to Aid Persons with                                                    Disabilities.  It is expected that                                              seven projects will be completed                                                each year.  The projects will range                                             from modifications of commercially                                              available devices to make the                                                   instruments suitable for use by a                                               person who has a disability, to the                                             design and construction of devices,                                             such as a car door opener, that do                                              not have any commercial                                                         counterpart.                                                                                                                                                    The design and development                                                      experience that is integral to                                                  these projects will provide the                                                 students with the opportunity to                                                work in groups, to write reports,                                               and to present the results at a                                                 scientific meeting.  It should also                                             help encourage them to pursue                                                   future careers in this area.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems
